entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers this evening. Periods of rain beginning late this evening then changing to periods of snow mixed with rain after midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023
